page.title: 08LOCAL NEWS (1)
page.content: Two local headmasters made the news this week(12.7.85)because they both retired after many years service in education.The unusual thing is that both headmasters were in charge of village schools,both retired at the same time and they live opposite each other! Mr K.Potts is the retiring head of Houghton School and Mr F.Boase is retiring from Rockcliffe School. Headmaster Mr Boase has often had to pick up balls from his garden next door to the school of Mr Potts! The local newspaper,the Cumberland News reported that they both shared the same interests too,'liquid refreshments'!
